reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects personal and non-personally identifiable information.
reply.reference: The 'INFORMATION YOU ARE REQUIRED TO PROVIDE' section outlines the personal information required and the 'ADDITIONAL INFORMATION' indicates the non-personally identifiable data collected. URL: https://www.neurojourneyapp.com/privacy-policy

PRIVACY POLICY
INTRODUCTION
The Neuro Journey App is operated by the AffirmedYou LLC (“AffirmedYou”, “we” “us” or “our”). The AffirmedYou LLC operates the Neuro Journey App Website (www.neurojourneyapp.com) and Neuro Journey App (each and “app” or “site”, respectively) and several related services (all such services, “Services”). The Privacy Policy should serve as an accessible guide to the information we collect during your use of the Services. By using the Services, you agree to this Privacy P...

also use cookies or web beacons to track a user’s interactions with the Services. This information will be used to deliver or optimize the Services, manage accounts, for research and analysis, to communicate with users and to develop content. You can opt-out of cookies by utilizing the settings provided in their browsers, but some of the functionality of the Services may be disabled or inaccessible if you do so. Additionally, we may collect information from our mobile application users who have ...

non-personally identifiable information. This will typically include:
i. Browser or platform type
ii. IP address, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request.
iii. Location Information
iv. Transactional Information and Billing Information.
v. Device Information
vi. Account Information
We collect this data to best serve our users. This information will never be released to others on a personally identifiable basis but may be released in a compiled manner.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects non-personally identifiable information which includes Browser or platform type, IP address, referring site, date and time of each visitor request, Location Information, Transactional Information, Billing Information, Device Information, and Account Information.

content: Referring site and time of request

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects non-personally identifiable information from users for various purposes. The data types collected encompass a wide range of information related to user interactions and characteristics.
reply.reference: This app collects non-personally identifiable information which will include Browser or platform type, IP address, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request, Location Information, Transactional Information, and Billing Information, Device Information, Account Information. URL: https://www.neurojourneyapp.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt-out of data collection by uninstalling the app(s) or delete data by requesting deletion of Personal Information and Account.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users can stop all collection of information by uninstalling the app(s) and can request deletion of their Personal Information and Account.
reply.reference: You can stop all collection of information by the App(s) by uninstalling the App(s). If you want us to delete your Personal Information and your Account, please contact us at hello@neurojourneyapp.com with your request. We will start the process to delete your information in a reasonable time. URL: https://www.neurojourneyapp.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may disclose certain Personal Information to third-party vendors, on demand by users, to affiliates, partners, subsidiaries, joint ventures, other companies, and in good faith to resolve disputes, investigate problems, enforce terms and conditions, comply with relevant laws, or respond to requests from law enforcement or government officials.
reply.reference: We may also disclose certain Personal Information: i. To third party vendors who helped us to provide you the services. ii. To third parties to whom you demand us to send Personal Information. iii. To our affiliates, partners, subsidiaries, joint ventures, or other companies. URL: https://www.neurojourneyapp.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with third-party vendors, third parties to whom users demand personal information to be sent, and affiliates, partners, subsidiaries, joint ventures, or other companies.

content: third parties to whom users demand personal information to be sent
affiliates, partners, subsidiaries, joint ventures, or other companies
